mapper.select: SELECT noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeContent, regdate, cnt FROM notice
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(max(noticeNo),0)+1 from notice
insert into notice(noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeContent, regdate) values (#{noticeNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{regdate})
mapper.update: update notice set noticeTitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticeContent=#{noticeContent} where noticeNo=#{noticeNo}
update notice set cnt=cnt+1 where noticeNo=#{noticeNo}
